titlestmt.titleproper: Student Clubs and Organizations, A-Z Files, 1880-[ongoing]
titlestmt.subtitle: Finding Aid
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Katrina Cokeng, Hattie Ryan, Maris Schwarz,.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded in NoteTab Pro. Encoded by Jeanne Lowrey. 2013-11-20

did.head: Collection Overview
did.unittitle: Student Clubs and Organizations, A-Z Files
did.abstract: The Student Clubs and Organizations, A-Z files contains charters, flyers, photographs, programs, articles, and notes documenting most of the student organizations since Smith was founded.

scopecontent.p: The Student Club Files contain information on most of the organizations since Smith College was founded. The records range from the early 1900s to the mid-2000s. Student clubs were formed as a way for Smith College students to engage with one another outside of the classroom. Activities of the clubs included academic, social, and political work. The clubs listed here are not those clubs associated with a particular academic pursuit. Information about these clubs may be found with the departmental records of the specific department in 52. Departments of the classification system. The types of material vary from club to club, but may include charters, flyers, photographs, programs, articles, and notes. Many folders have very little material in them, which often doesn't yield much information about the specific organizations. Usually, each organization's file contains at least a copy of the charter and a few photographs.

There are several clubs and organizations for which there are a wide variety of materials. Many of these records are separated into individual boxes and some have separate finding aids. If there is a note that an organization has a finding aid or separate box, please consult with a reference archivist.
The files are arranged alphabetically by club or organization name.

accessrestrict.p: The records are open for research according to the regulations of the Smith College Archives without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.p: Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the collection must be requested from the College Archives. The Archives has no information on the literary rights of the collection and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright.

prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Student Clubs and Organizations, A-Z files, Box #, Smith College Archives.

acqinfo.p: The Student Clubs and Organizations, A-Z files were donated over a period of time to the Smith College Archives from a variety of sources.
